structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Criteria for issuance or denial of certificates and for allowance or disallowance of exemptions to be adopted.
